title.raw: 《管蔡世家》 Houses of Guan and Cai

sentences.zh: 管叔鮮、蔡叔度者，周文王子而武王弟也。

translations.text: Guan Shu Xian, Cai Shu Du, Zhou Wen Wang sons and Wu Wang younger brothers.

sentences.zh: 武王同母兄弟十人。

translations.text: Wu Wang same mother brothers ten people.

sentences.zh: 母曰太姒，文王正妃也。

translations.text: Mother called Tai Si, Wen Wang proper wife.

sentences.zh: 其長子曰伯邑考，次曰武王發，次曰管叔鮮，次曰周公旦，次曰蔡叔度，次曰曹叔振鐸，次曰成叔武，次曰霍叔處，次曰康叔封，次曰冉季載。

translations.text: Its eldest son called Bo Yi Kao, next Wu Wang Fa, next Guan Shu Xian, next Zhou Gong Dan, next Cai Shu Du, next Cao Shu Zhen Duo, next Cheng Shu Wu, next Huo Shu Chu, next Kang Shu Feng, next Ran Ji Zai.

sentences.zh: 冉季載最少。

translations.text: Ran Ji Zai most young.

sentences.zh: 同母昆弟十人，唯發、旦賢，左右輔文王，故文王舍伯邑考而以發為太子。

translations.text: Same mother elder younger brothers ten people, only Fa, Dan worthy, left right assisted Wen Wang, so Wen Wang abandoned Bo Yi Kao made Fa crown prince.

sentences.zh: 及文王崩而發立，是為武王。

translations.text: To Wen Wang collapsed Fa established, this was Wu Wang.

sentences.zh: 伯邑考既已前卒矣。

translations.text: Bo Yi Kao already previously died.

Guan Shu Xian, Cai Shu Du, Zhou Wen Wang sons and Wu Wang younger brothers. Wu Wang same mother brothers ten people. Mother called Tai Si, Wen Wang proper wife. Its eldest son called Bo Yi Kao, next Wu Wang Fa, next Guan Shu Xian, next Zhou Gong Dan, next Cai Shu Du, next Cao Shu Zhen Duo, next Cheng Shu Wu, next Huo Shu Chu, next Kang Shu Feng, next Ran Ji Zai. Ran Ji Zai most young. Same mother elder younger brothers ten people, only Fa, Dan worthy, left right assisted Wen Wang, so Wen Wang abandoned Bo Yi Kao made Fa crown prince. To Wen Wang collapsed Fa established, this was Wu Wang. Bo Yi Kao already previously died.

sentences.zh: 武王已克殷紂，平天下，封功臣昆弟。

translations.text: Wu Wang already conquered Yin Zhou, pacified world, enfeoffed meritorious ministers elder younger brothers.

sentences.zh: 於是封叔鮮於管，封叔度於蔡：二人相紂子武庚祿父，治殷遺民。

translations.text: Then enfeoffed Shu Xian at Guan, enfeoffed Shu Du at Cai: two people mutually Zhou son Wu Geng Lu Fu, governed Yin remaining people.

sentences.zh: 封叔旦於魯而相周，為周公。

translations.text: Enfeoffed Shu Dan at Lu and mutually Zhou, became Zhou Gong.

sentences.zh: 封叔振鐸於曹，封叔武於成，封叔處於霍。

translations.text: Enfeoffed Shu Zhen Duo at Cao, enfeoffed Shu Wu at Cheng, enfeoffed Shu Chu at Huo.

sentences.zh: 康叔封、冉季載皆少，未得封。

translations.text: Kang Shu Feng, Ran Ji Zai all young, not obtained enfeoffment.

Wu Wang already conquered Yin Zhou, pacified world, enfeoffed meritorious ministers elder younger brothers. Then enfeoffed Shu Xian at Guan, enfeoffed Shu Du at Cai: two people mutually Zhou son Wu Geng Lu Fu, governed Yin remaining people. Enfeoffed Shu Dan at Lu and mutually Zhou, became Zhou Gong. Enfeoffed Shu Zhen Duo at Cao, enfeoffed Shu Wu at Cheng, enfeoffed Shu Chu at Huo. Kang Shu Feng, Ran Ji Zai all young, not obtained enfeoffment.

sentences.zh: 武王既崩，成王少，周公旦專王室。

translations.text: Wu Wang already collapsed, Cheng Wang young, Zhou Gong Dan monopolized Wang chamber.

sentences.zh: 管叔、蔡叔疑周公之為不利於成王，乃挾武庚以作亂。

translations.text: Guan Shu, Cai Shu doubted Zhou Gong's being harmful to Cheng Wang, then supported Wu Geng made disorder.

sentences.zh: 周公旦承成王命伐誅武庚，殺管叔，而放蔡叔，遷之，與車十乘，徒七十人從。

translations.text: Zhou Gong Dan received Cheng Wang command attacked executed Wu Geng, killed Guan Shu, banished Cai Shu, moved him, gave chariots ten, followers seventy people followed.

sentences.zh: 而分殷餘民為二：其一封微子啟於宋，以續殷祀；

translations.text: Divided Yin remaining people into two: its one enfeoffed Wei Zi Qi at Song, to continue Yin sacrifices;

sentences.zh: 其一封康叔為衛君，是為衛康叔。

translations.text: its one enfeoffed Kang Shu as Wei lord, this was Wei Kang Shu.

sentences.zh: 封季載於冉。

translations.text: Enfeoffed Ji Zai at Ran.

sentences.zh: 冉季、康叔皆有馴行，於是周公舉康叔為周司寇，冉季為周司空，以佐成王治，皆有令名於天下。

translations.text: Ran Ji, Kang Shu all had gentle conduct, then Zhou Gong raised Kang Shu as Zhou Si Kou, Ran Ji as Zhou Si Kong, to assist Cheng Wang govern, all had good reputation in world.

Wu Wang already collapsed, Cheng Wang young, Zhou Gong Dan monopolized Wang chamber. Guan Shu, Cai Shu doubted Zhou Gong's being harmful to Cheng Wang, then supported Wu Geng made disorder. Zhou Gong Dan received Cheng Wang command attacked executed Wu Geng, killed Guan Shu, banished Cai Shu, moved him, gave chariots ten, followers seventy people followed. Divided Yin remaining people into two: its one enfeoffed Wei Zi Qi at Song, to continue Yin sacrifices; its one enfeoffed Kang Shu as Wei lord, this was Wei Kang Shu. Enfeoffed Ji Zai at Ran. Ran Ji, Kang Shu all had gentle conduct, then Zhou Gong raised Kang Shu as Zhou Si Kou, Ran Ji as Zhou Si Kong, to assist Cheng Wang govern, all had good reputation in world.

sentences.zh: 蔡叔度既遷而死。

translations.text: Cai Shu Du already moved died.

sentences.zh: 其子曰胡，胡乃改行，率德馴善。

translations.text: His son called Hu, Hu then changed conduct, led virtue gentle good.

sentences.zh: 周公聞之，而舉胡以為魯卿士，魯國治。

translations.text: Zhou Gong heard it, raised Hu as Lu minister, Lu country governed.

sentences.zh: 於是周公言於成王，復封胡於蔡，以奉蔡叔之祀，是為蔡仲。

translations.text: Then Zhou Gong spoke to Cheng Wang, again enfeoffed Hu at Cai, to serve Cai Shu sacrifices, this was Cai Zhong.

sentences.zh: 餘五叔皆就國，無為天子吏者。

translations.text: Remaining five shu all went to states, no became heavenly son officials.

Cai Shu Du already moved died. His son called Hu, Hu then changed conduct, led virtue gentle good. Zhou Gong heard it, raised Hu as Lu minister, Lu country governed. Then Zhou Gong spoke to Cheng Wang, again enfeoffed Hu at Cai, to serve Cai Shu sacrifices, this was Cai Zhong. Remaining five shu all went to states, no became heavenly son officials.

sentences.zh: 蔡仲卒，子蔡伯荒立。

translations.text: Cai Zhong died, son Cai Bo Huang established.

sentences.zh: 蔡伯荒卒，子宮侯立。

translations.text: Cai Bo Huang died, son Gong Hou established.

sentences.zh: 宮侯卒，子厲侯立。

translations.text: Gong Hou died, son Li Hou established.

sentences.zh: 厲侯卒，子武侯立。

translations.text: Li Hou died, son Wu Hou established.

sentences.zh: 武侯之時，周厲王失國，奔彘，共和行政，諸侯多叛周。

translations.text: Wu Hou time, Zhou Li Wang lost country, fled Zhu, republican administered government, feudal lords many rebelled Zhou.

Cai Zhong died, son Cai Bo Huang established. Cai Bo Huang died, son Gong Hou established. Gong Hou died, son Li Hou established. Li Hou died, son Wu Hou established. Wu Hou time, Zhou Li Wang lost country, fled Zhu, republican administered government, feudal lords many rebelled Zhou.

sentences.zh: 武侯卒，子夷侯立。

translations.text: Wu Hou died, son Yi Hou established.

sentences.zh: 夷侯十一年，周宣王即位。

translations.text: Yi Hou eleven years, Zhou Xuan Wang ascended position.

sentences.zh: 二十八年，夷侯卒，子釐侯所事立。

translations.text: Twenty-eight years, Yi Hou died, son Xi Hou Suo Shi established.
Wu Hou died, son Yi Hou established. Yi Hou eleven years, Zhou Xuan Wang ascended position. Twenty-eight years, Yi Hou died, son Xi Hou Suo Shi established.

sentences.zh: 釐侯三十九年，周幽王為犬戎所殺，周室卑而東徙。

translations.text: Xi Hou thirty-nine years, Zhou You Wang for Quan Rong assassinated, Zhou chamber lowly moved east.

sentences.zh: 秦始得列為諸侯。

translations.text: Qin began ranked as feudal lords.
Xi Hou thirty-nine years, Zhou You Wang for Quan Rong assassinated, Zhou chamber lowly moved east. Qin began ranked as feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 四十八年，釐侯卒，子共侯興立。

translations.text: Forty-eight years, Xi Hou died, son Gong Hou Xing established.

sentences.zh: 共侯二年卒，子戴侯立。

translations.text: Gong Hou second year died, son Dai Hou established.

sentences.zh: 戴侯十年卒，子宣侯措父立。

translations.text: Dai Hou tenth year died, son Xuan Hou Cuo Fu established.
Forty-eight years, Xi Hou died, son Gong Hou Xing established. Gong Hou second year died, son Dai Hou established. Dai Hou tenth year died, son Xuan Hou Cuo Fu established.

sentences.zh: 宣侯二十八年，魯隱公初立。

translations.text: Xuan Hou twenty-eight years, Lu Yin Gong initially established.

sentences.zh: 三十五年，宣侯卒，子桓侯封人立。

translations.text: Thirty-five years, Xuan Hou died, son Huan Hou Feng Ren established.

sentences.zh: 桓侯三年，魯弒其君隱公。

translations.text: Huan Hou third year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong.

sentences.zh: 二十年，桓侯卒，弟哀侯獻舞立。

translations.text: Twenty years, Huan Hou died, younger brother Ai Hou Xian Wu established.

Xuan Hou twenty-eight years, Lu Yin Gong initially established. Thirty-five years, Xuan Hou died, son Huan Hou Feng Ren established. Huan Hou third year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong. Twenty years, Huan Hou died, younger brother Ai Hou Xian Wu established.

sentences.zh: 哀侯十一年，初，哀侯娶陳，息侯亦娶陳。

translations.text: Ai Hou eleven years, initially, Ai Hou married Chen, Xi Hou also married Chen.

sentences.zh: 息夫人將歸，過蔡，蔡侯不敬。

translations.text: Xi wife about return, passed Cai, Cai Hou not respectful.

sentences.zh: 息侯怒，請楚文王：「來伐我，我求救於蔡，蔡必來，楚因擊之，可以有功。」

translations.text: Xi Hou angered, requested Chu Wen Wang: 'Come attack me, I seek save at Cai, Cai must come, Chu because attack it, can have merit.'

sentences.zh: 楚文王從之，虜蔡哀侯以歸。

translations.text: Chu Wen Wang followed it, captured Cai Ai Hou returned.

sentences.zh: 哀侯留九歲，死於楚。

translations.text: Ai Hou stayed nine years, died at Chu.

sentences.zh: 凡立二十年卒。

translations.text: Altogether established twenty years died.

sentences.zh: 蔡人立其子肸，是為繆侯。

translations.text: Cai people established his son Xi, this was Mu Hou.

Ai Hou eleven years, initially, Ai Hou married Chen, Xi Hou also married Chen. Xi wife about return, passed Cai, Cai Hou not respectful. Xi Hou angered, requested Chu Wen Wang: 'Come attack me, I seek save at Cai, Cai must come, Chu because attack it, can have merit.' Chu Wen Wang followed it, captured Cai Ai Hou returned. Ai Hou stayed nine years, died at Chu. Altogether established twenty years died. Cai people established his son Xi, this was Mu Hou.

sentences.zh: 繆侯以其女弟為齊桓公夫人。

translations.text: Mu Hou with his younger sister as Qi Huan Gong wife.

sentences.zh: 十八年，齊桓公與蔡女戲船中，夫人蕩舟，桓公止之，不止，公怒，歸蔡女而不絕也。

translations.text: Eighteenth year, Qi Huan Gong with Cai woman played in boat, wife rocked boat, Huan Gong stopped her, not stopped, duke angered, returned Cai woman not cut off.

sentences.zh: 蔡侯怒，嫁其弟。

translations.text: Cai Hou angered, married off his younger brother.

sentences.zh: 齊桓公怒，伐蔡；

translations.text: Qi Huan Gong angered, attacked Cai;

sentences.zh: 蔡潰，遂虜繆侯，南至楚邵陵。

translations.text: Cai collapsed, then captured Mu Hou, south to Chu Shao Ling.

sentences.zh: 已而諸侯為蔡謝齊，齊侯歸蔡侯。

translations.text: Already then feudal lords for Cai apologized Qi, Qi Hou returned Cai Hou.

sentences.zh: 二十九年，繆侯卒，子莊侯甲午立。

translations.text: Twenty-nine years, Mu Hou died, son Zhuang Hou Jia Wu established.

Mu Hou with his younger sister as Qi Huan Gong wife. Eighteenth year, Qi Huan Gong with Cai woman played in boat, wife rocked boat, Huan Gong stopped her, not stopped, duke angered, returned Cai woman not cut off. Cai Hou angered, married off his younger brother. Qi Huan Gong angered, attacked Cai; Cai collapsed, then captured Mu Hou, south to Chu Shao Ling. Already then feudal lords for Cai apologized Qi, Qi Hou returned Cai Hou. Twenty-nine years, Mu Hou died, son Zhuang Hou Jia Wu established.

sentences.zh: 莊侯三年，齊桓公卒。

translations.text: Zhuang Hou third year, Qi Huan Gong died.

sentences.zh: 十四年，晉文公敗楚於城濮。

translations.text: Fourteenth year, Jin Wen Gong defeated Chu at Cheng Pu.

sentences.zh: 二十年，楚太子商臣弒其父成王代立。

translations.text: Twentieth year, Chu crown prince Shang Chen assassinated his father Cheng Wang replaced established.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，秦穆公卒。

translations.text: Twenty-fifth year, Qin Mu Gong died.

sentences.zh: 三十三年，楚莊王即位。

translations.text: Thirty-third year, Chu Zhuang Wang ascended position.

sentences.zh: 三十四年，莊侯卒，子文侯申立。

translations.text: Thirty-fourth year, Zhuang Hou died, son Wen Hou Shen established.

Zhuang Hou third year, Qi Huan Gong died. Fourteenth year, Jin Wen Gong defeated Chu at Cheng Pu. Twentieth year, Chu crown prince Shang Chen assassinated his father Cheng Wang replaced established. Twenty-fifth year, Qin Mu Gong died. Thirty-third year, Chu Zhuang Wang ascended position. Thirty-fourth year, Zhuang Hou died, son Wen Hou Shen established.

sentences.zh: 文侯十四年，楚莊王伐陳，殺夏徵舒。

translations.text: Wen Hou fourteenth year, Chu Zhuang Wang attacked Chen, killed Xia Zheng Shu.

sentences.zh: 十五年，楚圍鄭，鄭降楚，楚復醳之。

translations.text: Fifteenth year, Chu surrounded Zheng, Zheng surrendered Chu, Chu again released it.

sentences.zh: 二十年，文侯卒，子景侯固立。

translations.text: Twentieth year, Wen Hou died, son Jing Hou Gu established.

Wen Hou fourteenth year, Chu Zhuang Wang attacked Chen, killed Xia Zheng Shu. Fifteenth year, Chu surrounded Zheng, Zheng surrendered Chu, Chu again released it. Twentieth year, Wen Hou died, son Jing Hou Gu established.

sentences.zh: 景侯元年，楚莊王卒。

translations.text: Jing Hou first year, Chu Zhuang Wang died.

sentences.zh: 四十九年，景侯為太子般娶婦於楚，而景侯通焉。

translations.text: Forty-ninth year, Jing Hou for crown prince Ban married wife at Chu, Jing Hou communicated her.

sentences.zh: 太子弒景侯而自立，是為靈侯。

translations.text: Crown prince assassinated Jing Hou self established, this was Ling Hou.

Jing Hou first year, Chu Zhuang Wang died. Forty-ninth year, Jing Hou for crown prince Ban married wife at Chu, Jing Hou communicated her. Crown prince assassinated Jing Hou self established, this was Ling Hou.

sentences.zh: 靈侯二年，楚公子圍弒其王郟敖而自立，為靈王。

translations.text: Ling Hou second year, Chu gong zi Wei assassinated his wang Jia Ao self established, became Ling Wang.

sentences.zh: 九年，陳司徒招弒其君哀公。

translations.text: Ninth year, Chen Si Tu Zhao assassinated his lord Ai Gong.

sentences.zh: 楚使公子棄疾滅陳而有之。

translations.text: Chu made gong zi Qi Ji extinguished Chen had it.

sentences.zh: 十二年，楚靈王以靈侯弒其父，誘蔡靈侯于申，伏甲飲之，醉而殺之，刑其士卒七十人。

translations.text: Twelfth year, Chu Ling Wang because Ling Hou assassinated his father, lured Cai Ling Hou at Shen, hid armor feasted him, intoxicated killed him, punished his soldiers seventy people.

sentences.zh: 令公子棄疾圍蔡。

translations.text: Ordered gong zi Qi Ji surrounded Cai.

sentences.zh: 十一月，滅蔡，使棄疾為蔡公。

translations.text: Eleventh month, extinguished Cai, made Qi Ji as Cai Gong.

Ling Hou second year, Chu gong zi Wei assassinated his wang Jia Ao self established, became Ling Wang. Ninth year, Chen Si Tu Zhao assassinated his lord Ai Gong. Chu made gong zi Qi Ji extinguished Chen had it. Twelfth year, Chu Ling Wang because Ling Hou assassinated his father, lured Cai Ling Hou at Shen, hid armor feasted him, intoxicated killed him, punished his soldiers seventy people. Ordered gong zi Qi Ji surrounded Cai. Eleventh month, extinguished Cai, made Qi Ji as Cai Gong.

sentences.zh: 楚滅蔡三歲，楚公子棄疾弒其君靈王代立，為平王。

translations.text: Chu extinguished Cai three years, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated his lord Ling Wang replaced established, became Ping Wang.

sentences.zh: 平王乃求蔡景侯少子廬，立之，是為平侯。

translations.text: Ping Wang then sought Cai Jing Hou youngest son Lu, established him, this was Ping Hou.

sentences.zh: 是年，楚亦復立陳。

translations.text: This year, Chu also again established Chen.

sentences.zh: 楚平王初立，欲親諸侯，故復立陳、蔡後。

translations.text: Chu Ping Wang initially established, wished close feudal lords, so again established Chen, Cai successors.

Chu extinguished Cai three years, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated his lord Ling Wang replaced established, became Ping Wang. Ping Wang then sought Cai Jing Hou youngest son Lu, established him, this was Ping Hou. This year, Chu also again established Chen. Chu Ping Wang initially established, wished close feudal lords, so again established Chen, Cai successors.

sentences.zh: 平侯九年卒，靈侯般之孫東國攻平侯子而自立，是為悼侯。

translations.text: Ping Hou nine years died, Ling Hou Ban's grandson Dong Guo attacked Ping Hou son self established, this was Dao Hou.

sentences.zh: 悼侯父曰隱太子友。

translations.text: Dao Hou father called Yin crown prince You.

sentences.zh: 隱太子友者，靈侯之太子，平侯立而殺隱太子，故平侯卒而隱太子之子東國攻平侯子而代立，是為悼侯。

translations.text: Yin crown prince You, Ling Hou crown prince, Ping Hou established killed Yin crown prince, so Ping Hou died Yin crown prince son Dong Guo attacked Ping Hou son replaced established, this was Dao Hou.

sentences.zh: 悼侯三年卒，弟昭侯申立。

translations.text: Dao Hou third year died, younger brother Zhao Hou Shen established.

Ping Hou nine years died, Ling Hou Ban's grandson Dong Guo attacked Ping Hou son self established, this was Dao Hou. Dao Hou father called Yin crown prince You. Yin crown prince You, Ling Hou crown prince, Ping Hou established killed Yin crown prince, so Ping Hou died Yin crown prince son Dong Guo attacked Ping Hou son replaced established, this was Dao Hou. Dao Hou third year died, younger brother Zhao Hou Shen established.

sentences.zh: 昭侯十年，朝楚昭王，持美裘二，獻其一於昭王而自衣其一。

translations.text: Zhao Hou tenth year, court Chu Zhao Wang, held beautiful fur two, offered its one to Zhao Wang self wore its one.

sentences.zh: 楚相子常欲之，不與。

translations.text: Chu chancellor Zi Chang desired it, not gave.

sentences.zh: 子常讒蔡侯，留之楚三年。

translations.text: Zi Chang slandered Cai Hou, detained him Chu three years.

sentences.zh: 蔡侯知之，乃獻其裘於子常；

translations.text: Cai Hou knew it, then offered his fur to Zi Chang;

sentences.zh: 子常受之，乃言歸蔡侯。

translations.text: Zi Chang received it, then spoke returned Cai Hou.

sentences.zh: 蔡侯歸而之晉，請與晉伐楚。

translations.text: Cai Hou returned went to Jin, requested with Jin attacked Chu.

Zhao Hou tenth year, court Chu Zhao Wang, held beautiful fur two, offered its one to Zhao Wang self wore its one. Chu chancellor Zi Chang desired it, not gave. Zi Chang slandered Cai Hou, detained him Chu three years. Cai Hou knew it, then offered his fur to Zi Chang; Zi Chang received it, then spoke returned Cai Hou. Cai Hou returned went to Jin, requested with Jin attacked Chu.

sentences.zh: 十三年春，與衛靈公會邵陵。

translations.text: Thirteenth year spring, with Wei Ling Gong assembled Shao Ling.

sentences.zh: 蔡侯私於周萇弘以求長於衛；

translations.text: Cai Hou privately with Zhou Zhang Hong sought seniority over Wei;

sentences.zh: 衛使史言康叔之功德，乃長衛。

translations.text: Wei made shi spoke Kang Shu merit virtue, then senior Wei.

sentences.zh: 夏，為晉滅沈，楚怒，攻蔡。

translations.text: Summer, for Jin extinguished Shen, Chu angered, attacked Cai.

sentences.zh: 蔡昭侯使其子為質於吳，以共伐楚。

translations.text: Cai Zhao Hou made his son hostage at Wu, to together attacked Chu.

sentences.zh: 冬，與吳王闔閭遂破楚入郢。

translations.text: Winter, with Wu Wang He Lu then broke Chu entered Ying.

sentences.zh: 蔡怨子常，子常恐，奔鄭。

translations.text: Cai resented Zi Chang, Zi Chang feared, fled Zheng.

sentences.zh: 十四年，吳去而楚昭王復國。

translations.text: Fourteenth year, Wu left Chu Zhao Wang restored country.

sentences.zh: 十六年，楚令尹為其民泣以謀蔡，蔡昭侯懼。

translations.text: Sixteenth year, Chu Ling Yin for his people cried to plot Cai, Cai Zhao Hou feared.

sentences.zh: 二十六年，孔子如蔡。

translations.text: Twenty-sixth year, Kong Qiu went to Cai.

sentences.zh: 楚昭王伐蔡，蔡恐，告急於吳。

translations.text: Chu Zhao Wang attacked Cai, Cai feared, urgently told Wu.

sentences.zh: 吳為蔡遠，約遷以自近，易以相救；

translations.text: Wu for Cai distant, allied moved to self close, exchanged to mutually save;

sentences.zh: 昭侯私許，不與大夫計。

translations.text: Zhao Hou privately permitted, not with grand masters planned.

sentences.zh: 吳人來救蔡，因遷蔡于州來。

translations.text: Wu people came save Cai, because moved Cai to Zhou Lai.

sentences.zh: 二十八年，昭侯將朝于吳，大夫恐其復遷，乃令賊利殺昭侯；

translations.text: Twenty-eighth year, Zhao Hou about court Wu, grand masters feared his again moved, then ordered thief Li kill Zhao Hou;

sentences.zh: 已而誅賊利以解過，而立昭侯子朔，是為成侯。

translations.text: already then executed thief Li to resolve mistake, established Zhao Hou son Shuo, this was Cheng Hou.

Thirteenth year spring, with Wei Ling Gong assembled Shao Ling. Cai Hou privately with Zhou Zhang Hong sought seniority over Wei; Wei made shi spoke Kang Shu merit virtue, then senior Wei. Summer, for Jin extinguished Shen, Chu angered, attacked Cai. Cai Zhao Hou made his son hostage at Wu, to together attacked Chu. Winter, with Wu Wang He Lu then broke Chu entered Ying. Cai resented Zi Chang, Zi Chang feared, fled Zheng. Fourteenth year, Wu left Chu Zhao Wang restored country. Sixteenth year, Chu Ling Yin for his people cried to plot Cai, Cai Zhao Hou feared. Twenty-sixth year, Kong Qiu went to Cai. Chu Zhao Wang attacked Cai, Cai feared, urgently told Wu. Wu for Cai distant, allied moved to self close, exchanged to mutually save; Zhao Hou privately permitted, not with grand masters planned. Wu people came save Cai, because moved Cai to Zhou Lai. Twenty-eighth year, Zhao Hou about court Wu, grand masters feared his again moved, then ordered thief Li kill Zhao Hou; already then executed thief Li to resolve mistake, established Zhao Hou son Shuo, this was Cheng Hou.

sentences.zh: 成侯四年，宋滅曹。

translations.text: Cheng Hou fourth year, Song extinguished Cao.

sentences.zh: 十年，齊田常弒其君簡公。

translations.text: Tenth year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated their lord Jian Gong.

sentences.zh: 十三年，楚滅陳。

translations.text: Thirteenth year, Chu extinguished Chen.

sentences.zh: 十九年，成侯卒，子聲侯產立。

translations.text: Nineteenth year, Cheng Hou died, son Sheng Hou Chan established.

sentences.zh: 聲侯十五年卒，子元侯立。

translations.text: Sheng Hou fifteenth year died, son Yuan Hou established.

sentences.zh: 元侯六年卒，子侯齊立。

translations.text: Yuan Hou sixth year died, son Hou Qi established.

Cheng Hou fourth year, Song extinguished Cao. Tenth year, Qi Tian Chang assassinated their lord Jian Gong. Thirteenth year, Chu extinguished Chen. Nineteenth year, Cheng Hou died, son Sheng Hou Chan established. Sheng Hou fifteenth year died, son Yuan Hou established. Yuan Hou sixth year died, son Hou Qi established.

sentences.zh: 侯齊四年，楚惠王滅蔡，蔡侯齊亡，蔡遂絕祀。

translations.text: Hou Qi fourth year, Chu Hui Wang extinguished Cai, Cai Hou Qi fled, Cai then cut off sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 後陳滅三十三年。

translations.text: After Chen extinguished thirty-three years.
Hou Qi fourth year, Chu Hui Wang extinguished Cai, Cai Hou Qi fled, Cai then cut off sacrifices. After Chen extinguished thirty-three years.

sentences.zh: 伯邑考，其後不知所封。

translations.text: Bo Yi Kao, his after not known enfeoffed where.

sentences.zh: 武王發，其後為周，有本紀言。

translations.text: Wu Wang Fa, his after became Zhou, has basic record speaks.

sentences.zh: 管叔鮮作亂誅死，無後。

translations.text: Guan Shu Xian made disorder executed died, no descendants.

sentences.zh: 周公旦，其後為魯，有世家言。

translations.text: Zhou Gong Dan, his after became Lu, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 蔡叔度，其後為蔡，有世家言。

translations.text: Cai Shu Du, his after became Cai, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 曹叔振鐸，有後為曹，有世家言。

translations.text: Cao Shu Zhen Duo, has descendants became Cao, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 成叔武，其後世無所見。

translations.text: Cheng Shu Wu, his after generations nothing seen.

sentences.zh: 霍叔處，其後晉獻公時滅霍。

translations.text: Huo Shu Chu, his after Jin Xian Gong time extinguished Huo.

sentences.zh: 康叔封，其後為衛，有世家言。

translations.text: Kang Shu Feng, his after became Wei, has genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 冉季載，其後世無所見。

translations.text: Ran Ji Zai, his after generations nothing seen.

Bo Yi Kao, his after not known enfeoffed where. Wu Wang Fa, his after became Zhou, has basic record speaks. Guan Shu Xian made disorder executed died, no descendants. Zhou Gong Dan, his after became Lu, has genealogy speaks. Cai Shu Du, his after became Cai, has genealogy speaks. Cao Shu Zhen Duo, has descendants became Cao, has genealogy speaks. Cheng Shu Wu, his after generations nothing seen. Huo Shu Chu, his after Jin Xian Gong time extinguished Huo. Kang Shu Feng, his after became Wei, has genealogy speaks. Ran Ji Zai, his after generations nothing seen.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：管蔡作亂，無足載者。

translations.text: Grand Historian said: Guan Cai made disorder, no worth recording.

sentences.zh: 然周武王崩，成王少，天下既疑，賴同母之弟成叔、冉季之屬十人為輔拂，是以諸侯卒宗周，故附之世家言。

translations.text: But Zhou Wu Wang collapsed, Cheng Wang young, world already doubted, relied same mother younger brothers Cheng Shu, Ran Ji etc. ten people assisted protected, so feudal lords finally revered Zhou, so attached genealogy speaks.

Grand Historian said: Guan Cai made disorder, no worth recording. But Zhou Wu Wang collapsed, Cheng Wang young, world already doubted, relied same mother younger brothers Cheng Shu, Ran Ji etc. ten people assisted protected, so feudal lords finally revered Zhou, so attached genealogy speaks.

sentences.zh: 曹叔振鐸者，周武王弟也。

translations.text: Cao Shu Zhen Duo, Zhou Wu Wang younger brother.

sentences.zh: 武王已克殷紂，封叔振鐸於曹。

translations.text: Wu Wang already conquered Yin Zhou, enfeoffed Shu Zhen Duo at Cao.
Cao Shu Zhen Duo, Zhou Wu Wang younger brother. Wu Wang already conquered Yin Zhou, enfeoffed Shu Zhen Duo at Cao.

sentences.zh: 叔振鐸卒，子太伯脾立。

translations.text: Shu Zhen Duo died, son Tai Bo Pi established.

sentences.zh: 太伯卒，子仲君平立。

translations.text: Tai Bo died, son Zhong Jun Ping established.

sentences.zh: 仲君平卒，子宮伯侯立。

translations.text: Zhong Jun Ping died, son Gong Bo Hou established.

sentences.zh: 宮伯侯卒，子孝伯云立。

translations.text: Gong Bo Hou died, son Xiao Bo Yun established.

sentences.zh: 孝伯云卒，子夷伯喜立。

translations.text: Xiao Bo Yun died, son Yi Bo Xi established.

Shu Zhen Duo died, son Tai Bo Pi established. Tai Bo died, son Zhong Jun Ping established. Zhong Jun Ping died, son Gong Bo Hou established. Gong Bo Hou died, son Xiao Bo Yun established. Xiao Bo Yun died, son Yi Bo Xi established.

sentences.zh: 夷伯二十三年，周厲王奔于彘。

translations.text: Yi Bo twenty-third year, Zhou Li Wang fled Zhu.
Yi Bo twenty-third year, Zhou Li Wang fled Zhu.

sentences.zh: 三十年卒，弟幽伯彊立。

translations.text: Thirtieth year died, younger brother You Bo Qiang established.

sentences.zh: 幽伯九年，弟蘇殺幽伯代立，是為戴伯。

translations.text: You Bo ninth year, younger brother Su killed You Bo replaced established, this was Dai Bo.

sentences.zh: 戴伯元年，周宣王已立三歲。

translations.text: Dai Bo first year, Zhou Xuan Wang already established three years.

sentences.zh: 三十年，戴伯卒，子惠伯兕立。

translations.text: Thirtieth year, Dai Bo died, son Hui Bo Si established.

Thirtieth year died, younger brother You Bo Qiang established. You Bo ninth year, younger brother Su killed You Bo replaced established, this was Dai Bo. Dai Bo first year, Zhou Xuan Wang already established three years. Thirtieth year, Dai Bo died, son Hui Bo Si established.

sentences.zh: 惠伯二十五年，周幽王為犬戎所殺，因東徙，益卑，諸侯畔之。

translations.text: Hui Bo twenty-fifth year, Zhou You Wang for Quan Rong assassinated, because east moved, increasingly lowly, feudal lords rebelled it.

sentences.zh: 秦始列為諸侯。

translations.text: Qin began ranked as feudal lords.
Hui Bo twenty-fifth year, Zhou You Wang for Quan Rong assassinated, because east moved, increasingly lowly, feudal lords rebelled it. Qin began ranked as feudal lords.

sentences.zh: 三十六，惠伯卒，子石甫立，其弟武殺之代立，是為繆公。

translations.text: Thirty-sixth year, Hui Bo died, son Shi Fu established, his younger brother Wu killed him replaced established, this was Mu Gong.

sentences.zh: 繆公三年卒，子桓公終生立。

translations.text: Mu Gong third year died, son Huan Gong Zhong Sheng established.
Thirty-sixth year, Hui Bo died, son Shi Fu established, his younger brother Wu killed him replaced established, this was Mu Gong. Mu Gong third year died, son Huan Gong Zhong Sheng established.

sentences.zh: 桓公三十五年，魯隱公立。

translations.text: Huan Gong thirty-fifth year, Lu Yin Gong established.

sentences.zh: 四十五年，魯弒其君隱公。

translations.text: Forty-fifth year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong.

sentences.zh: 四十六年，宋華父督弒其君殤公，及孔父。

translations.text: Forty-sixth year, Song Hua Fu Du assassinated their lord Shang Gong, and Kong Fu.

sentences.zh: 五十五年，桓公卒，子莊公夕姑立。

translations.text: Fifty-fifth year, Huan Gong died, son Zhuang Gong Xi Gu established.

Huan Gong thirty-fifth year, Lu Yin Gong established. Forty-fifth year, Lu assassinated their lord Yin Gong. Forty-sixth year, Song Hua Fu Du assassinated their lord Shang Gong, and Kong Fu. Fifty-fifth year, Huan Gong died, son Zhuang Gong Xi Gu established.

sentences.zh: 莊公二十三年，齊桓公始霸。

translations.text: Zhuang Gong twenty-third year, Qi Huan Gong began hegemon.
Zhuang Gong twenty-third year, Qi Huan Gong began hegemon.

sentences.zh: 三十一年，莊公卒，子釐公夷立。

translations.text: Thirty-first year, Zhuang Gong died, son Xi Gong Yi established.

sentences.zh: 釐公九年卒，子昭公班立。

translations.text: Xi Gong ninth year died, son Zhao Gong Ban established.

sentences.zh: 昭公六年，齊桓公敗蔡，遂至楚召陵。

translations.text: Zhao Gong sixth year, Qi Huan Gong defeated Cai, then to Chu Zhao Ling.

sentences.zh: 九年，昭公卒，子共公襄立。

translations.text: Ninth year, Zhao Gong died, son Gong Gong Xiang established.

Thirty-first year, Zhuang Gong died, son Xi Gong Yi established. Xi Gong ninth year died, son Zhao Gong Ban established. Zhao Gong sixth year, Qi Huan Gong defeated Cai, then to Chu Zhao Ling. Ninth year, Zhao Gong died, son Gong Gong Xiang established.

sentences.zh: 共公十六年，初，晉公子重耳其亡過曹，曹君無禮，欲觀其駢脅。

translations.text: Gong Gong sixteenth year, initially, Jin gong zi Chong Er his fleeing passed Cao, Cao lord no rites, wished observe his joined ribs.

sentences.zh: 釐負羈諫，不聽，私善於重耳。

translations.text: Xi Fu Ji advised, not listened, privately good to Chong Er.

sentences.zh: 二十一年，晉文公重耳伐曹，虜共公以歸，令軍毋入釐負羈之宗族閭。

translations.text: Twenty-first year, Jin Wen Gong Chong Er attacked Cao, captured Gong Gong returned, ordered army not enter Xi Fu Ji clan alley.

sentences.zh: 或說晉文公曰：「昔齊桓公會諸侯，復異姓；

translations.text: Someone persuaded Jin Wen Gong said: 'Formerly Qi Huan Gong assembled feudal lords, restored different surnames;

sentences.zh: 今君囚曹君，滅同姓，何以令於諸侯？」

translations.text: now lord imprisoned Cao lord, extinguished same surname, how to command feudal lords?'

sentences.zh: 晉乃復歸共公。

translations.text: Jin then again returned Gong Gong.

Gong Gong sixteenth year, initially, Jin gong zi Chong Er his fleeing passed Cao, Cao lord no rites, wished observe his joined ribs. Xi Fu Ji advised, not listened, privately good to Chong Er. Twenty-first year, Jin Wen Gong Chong Er attacked Cao, captured Gong Gong returned, ordered army not enter Xi Fu Ji clan alley. Someone persuaded Jin Wen Gong said: 'Formerly Qi Huan Gong assembled feudal lords, restored different surnames; now lord imprisoned Cao lord, extinguished same surname, how to command feudal lords?' Jin then again returned Gong Gong.

sentences.zh: 二十五年，晉文公卒。

translations.text: Twenty-fifth year, Jin Wen Gong died.

sentences.zh: 三十五年，共公卒，子文公壽立。

translations.text: Thirty-fifth year, Gong Gong died, son Wen Gong Shou established.

sentences.zh: 文公二十三年卒，子宣公彊立。

translations.text: Wen Gong twenty-third year died, son Xuan Gong Qiang established.

sentences.zh: 宣公十七年卒，弟成公負芻立。

translations.text: Xuan Gong seventeenth year died, younger brother Cheng Gong Fu Chu established.

Twenty-fifth year, Jin Wen Gong died. Thirty-fifth year, Gong Gong died, son Wen Gong Shou established. Wen Gong twenty-third year died, son Xuan Gong Qiang established. Xuan Gong seventeenth year died, younger brother Cheng Gong Fu Chu established.

sentences.zh: 成公三年，晉厲公伐曹，虜成公以歸，已復釋之。

translations.text: Cheng Gong third year, Jin Li Gong attacked Cao, captured Cheng Gong returned, already again released him.

sentences.zh: 五年，晉欒書、中行偃使程滑弒其君厲公。

translations.text: Fifth year, Jin Luan Shu, Zhong Xing Yan made Cheng Hua assassinated their lord Li Gong.

sentences.zh: 二十三年，成公卒，子武公勝立。

translations.text: Twenty-third year, Cheng Gong died, son Wu Gong Sheng established.

sentences.zh: 武公二十六年，楚公子棄疾弒其君靈王代立。

translations.text: Wu Gong twenty-sixth year, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated their lord Ling Wang replaced established.

sentences.zh: 二十七年，武公卒，子平公（頃）［須］立。

translations.text: Twenty-seventh year, Wu Gong died, son Ping Gong Xu established.

sentences.zh: 平公四年卒，子悼公午立。

translations.text: Ping Gong fourth year died, son Dao Gong Wu established.

sentences.zh: 是歲，宋、衛、陳、鄭皆火。

translations.text: This year, Song, Wei, Chen, Zheng all fire.

Cheng Gong third year, Jin Li Gong attacked Cao, captured Cheng Gong returned, already again released him. Fifth year, Jin Luan Shu, Zhong Xing Yan made Cheng Hua assassinated their lord Li Gong. Twenty-third year, Cheng Gong died, son Wu Gong Sheng established. Wu Gong twenty-sixth year, Chu gong zi Qi Ji assassinated their lord Ling Wang replaced established. Twenty-seventh year, Wu Gong died, son Ping Gong Xu established. Ping Gong fourth year died, son Dao Gong Wu established. This year, Song, Wei, Chen, Zheng all fire.

sentences.zh: 悼公八年，宋景公立。

translations.text: Dao Gong eighth year, Song Jing Gong established.

sentences.zh: 九年，悼公朝于宋，宋囚之；

translations.text: Ninth year, Dao Gong court Song, Song imprisoned him;

sentences.zh: 曹立其弟野，是為聲公。

translations.text: Cao established his younger brother Ye, this was Sheng Gong.

sentences.zh: 悼公死於宋，歸葬。

translations.text: Dao Gong died at Song, returned buried.

Dao Gong eighth year, Song Jing Gong established. Ninth year, Dao Gong court Song, Song imprisoned him; Cao established his younger brother Ye, this was Sheng Gong. Dao Gong died at Song, returned buried.

sentences.zh: 聲公五年，平公弟通弒聲公代立，是為隱公。

translations.text: Sheng Gong fifth year, Ping Gong younger brother Tong assassinated Sheng Gong replaced established, this was Yin Gong.

sentences.zh: 隱公四年，聲公弟露弒隱公代立，是為靖公。

translations.text: Yin Gong fourth year, Sheng Gong younger brother Lu assassinated Yin Gong replaced established, this was Jing Gong.

sentences.zh: 靖公四年卒，子伯陽立。

translations.text: Jing Gong fourth year died, son Bo Yang established.

Sheng Gong fifth year, Ping Gong younger brother Tong assassinated Sheng Gong replaced established, this was Yin Gong. Yin Gong fourth year, Sheng Gong younger brother Lu assassinated Yin Gong replaced established, this was Jing Gong. Jing Gong fourth year died, son Bo Yang established.

sentences.zh: 伯陽三年，國人有夢眾君子立于社宮，謀欲亡曹；

translations.text: Bo Yang third year, country people dreamed many gentlemen stood at altar palace, plotted wished perish Cao;

sentences.zh: 曹叔振鐸止之，請待公孫彊，許之。

translations.text: Cao Shu Zhen Duo stopped them, requested wait Gong Sun Qiang, permitted.

sentences.zh: 旦，求之曹，無此人。

translations.text: Dawn, sought him at Cao, no this person.

sentences.zh: 夢者戒其子曰：「我亡，爾聞公孫彊為政，必去曹，無離曹禍。」

translations.text: Dreamer warned his son said: 'I perish, you hear Gong Sun Qiang administers government, must leave Cao, no separate Cao calamity.'

sentences.zh: 及伯陽即位，好田弋之事。

translations.text: To Bo Yang ascended position, liked hunting shooting affairs.

sentences.zh: 六年，曹野人公孫彊亦好田弋，獲白鴈而獻之，且言田弋之說，因訪政事。

translations.text: Sixth year, Cao wild person Gong Sun Qiang also liked hunting shooting, obtained white goose offered it, moreover spoke hunting shooting sayings, because visited government affairs.

sentences.zh: 伯陽大說之，有寵，使為司城以聽政。

translations.text: Bo Yang greatly pleased him, had favor, made him Si Cheng to listen government.

sentences.zh: 夢者之子乃亡去。

translations.text: Dreamer's son then fled away.

Bo Yang third year, country people dreamed many gentlemen stood at altar palace, plotted wished perish Cao; Cao Shu Zhen Duo stopped them, requested wait Gong Sun Qiang, permitted. Dawn, sought him at Cao, no this person. Dreamer warned his son said: 'I perish, you hear Gong Sun Qiang administers government, must leave Cao, no separate Cao calamity.' To Bo Yang ascended position, liked hunting shooting affairs. Sixth year, Cao wild person Gong Sun Qiang also liked hunting shooting, obtained white goose offered it, moreover spoke hunting shooting sayings, because visited government affairs. Bo Yang greatly pleased him, had favor, made him Si Cheng to listen government. Dreamer's son then fled away.

sentences.zh: 公孫彊言霸說於曹伯。

translations.text: Gong Sun Qiang spoke hegemon sayings to Cao Bo.

sentences.zh: 十四年，曹伯從之，乃背晉干宋。

translations.text: Fourteenth year, Cao Bo followed it, then broke Jin offended Song.

sentences.zh: 宋景公伐之，晉人不救。

translations.text: Song Jing Gong attacked it, Jin people not saved.

sentences.zh: 十五年，宋滅曹，執曹伯陽及公孫彊以歸而殺之。

translations.text: Fifteenth year, Song extinguished Cao, captured Cao Bo Yang and Gong Sun Qiang returned killed them.

sentences.zh: 曹遂絕其祀。

translations.text: Cao then cut off its sacrifices.

Gong Sun Qiang spoke hegemon sayings to Cao Bo. Fourteenth year, Cao Bo followed it, then broke Jin offended Song. Song Jing Gong attacked it, Jin people not saved. Fifteenth year, Song extinguished Cao, captured Cao Bo Yang and Gong Sun Qiang returned killed them. Cao then cut off its sacrifices.

sentences.zh: 太史公曰：余尋曹共公之不用僖負羈，乃乘軒者三百人，知唯德之不建。

translations.text: Grand Historian said: I sought Cao Gong Gong's not used Xi Fu Ji, then rode chariots three hundred people, knew only virtue not established.

sentences.zh: 及振鐸之夢，豈不欲引曹之祀者哉？

translations.text: To Zhen Duo's dream, how not wished extend Cao sacrifices?

sentences.zh: 如公孫彊不修厥政，叔鐸之祀忽諸。

translations.text: Like Gong Sun Qiang not repaired his government, Shu Duo's sacrifices suddenly perished.

Grand Historian said: I sought Cao Gong Gong's not used Xi Fu Ji, then rode chariots three hundred people, knew only virtue not established. To Zhen Duo's dream, how not wished extend Cao sacrifices? Like Gong Sun Qiang not repaired his government, Shu Duo's sacrifices suddenly perished.
